title: Patch Notes
content: mod warning with clearer messaging. Fixed a mod issue preventing some modded classes and subclasses from levelling up. Fixed a bug causing the Mod Verification window to appear empty and preventing you from closing it if you get a warning about insufficient storage before it opens. You can now navigate between the left and right columns of the Installed tab in the Mod Manager with a controller. Improved Character Creation functionality for modded games.
